item.description:
Yo, Myself Paramjot Malhotra (aka param) Link to heading

By day, Iâ€™m a DevOps engineer who runs on 4 cups of cappuccino (400ml; taken at regular intervals during the day) to function properly through my 9 to 5. And by night, I suffer from insomnia (because of all the caf-fe!n-e intake - duh) so I shit-post on reddit or theprimeagen’s livestream.

I like working towards my skills so I can be more productive. I overthink my architecture before I implement it. And for some reason I have a weird tendency to turn my side projects into a full-blown, over-the-top, military-grade, nuclear-war-ready infrastructure design like we are gonna have a million users the next morning I wake up with aliens invading AWS centers and taking them down as I read the headlines.
